author: daniellehrner
content: The other bug was very Besu specific. We did not correctly track the balance change if the sender of a transaction did sign an authorization as well. At the end of the transaction the calculated gas refund was too high and therefore the balance incorrect. I do not think that this was triggered on the devnet.
